title: NewsComm: a hand-held interface for interactive access to structured audio
proctitle: CHI '96: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Deb K. Roy
authors.institution: Speech Research Group, MIT Media Lab, 20 Ames Street, Cambridge, MA

authors.name: Chris Schmandt

references.text: Arons, B. Speech Skimmer: Interactively Skimming Recorded Speech. Ph.D. thesis, MIT Media Lab, 1994.
